@graph.title: Cilurnum
@graph.description: Cilurnum is the site of a fort dating to A.D. 123 on Hadrian's Wall that guarded a military bridge along the Roman road. It is now known as Chester's Roman Fort.
@graph.rights: Copyright Â© The Creators. Sharing and remixing permitted under terms of the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License (cc-by).
